descriptionlist.description:
This package depends libsparkcolourpicker package from SparkDev: https://sparkdev.me/

Add customizable pasteboard shortcuts to your iPad keyboard! If you own an iPhone, check out DockX.

Supporting iPadOS (13.0+).

Available shortcuts:
•Select
•Select All
•Select Line
•Select Paragraph
•Select Sentence
•Copy
•Paste
•Cut
•Undo
•Redo
•Beginning of Document
•Ending of Document
•Capitalize
•Lowercase
•Uppercase
•Delete
•Bold
•Italic
•Underline
•Cursor Left
•Cursor Right
•Cursor Up
•Cursor Down
•Dismiss Keyboard
•Auto-Correction
•Auto-Capitalization
•Keyboard Input Type
•Define Word
•Shell Command
•Insert Text
•Previous Word
•Next Word
•Line Start
•Line End
•Start of Paragraph
•End of Paragraph
•Start of Sentence
•End of Sentence
•Globe
•Dictation
•Studly Caps (SpOnGebOb tExT)

Third-party tweak shortcuts:
•CopyLog*
•Translomatic*
•Wasabi*
•Pasithea*
•Copypasta*
•Loupe*
•Tranzlo*

Available gestures:
•Single tap
•Long Press
•Double Tap

and many more default long press gesture for each shortcut

Go to setting page to manage your shortcuts.

To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs

*Package needs to be installed for shortcut to show.
